title: The Senses of man
creator_credit: Gateway Educational Films and Indiana University. Audio Visual Center
brief_description: Shows the importance of sense receptors of temperature, pressure, touch and pain. Discusses health considerations pertaining to the senses. A film from the Human Physiology series.
